sentences.en: Many poor countries are abandoning autocracy.
sentences.cn: 很多贫穷国家都在推翻独裁统治。

sentences.en: With the help of its neighbors, a country could be rescued from autocracy.
sentences.cn: 如果它的邻居可以帮助它, 那么它就可以摆脱专制.

sentences.en: Zhang insisted local autonomy is the only way to protect autocracy or rule by warlord.
sentences.cn: 根据他的意见,地方自治让政治权力多元化,而且防止专制与军阀统治.

words.tran_cn: 独裁政治；专制政治；独裁政府；独裁统治的国家

trans.tran_cn: 独裁，独裁统治，独裁政体，独裁政府
trans.tran_en: a system of government in which one person or group has unlimited power
